get.description: Returns the redirect URL for the platform in order to authenticate the user on the target platform

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to connect to

parameters.name: x-orchdio-public-key
parameters.description: The public key of the Orchdio server

parameters.name: scopes
parameters.description: The scopes to request from the platform. This is a comma separated list of scopes and is optional only for Deezer. You can get the scopes from the platform's documentation. <Here> is a link to the Spotify scopes.

/v1/entity/convert.description: Converts an entity from one platform to another. An entity can be a track or a playlist.

parameters.name: x-orchdio-public-key
parameters.description: The public key of the Orchdio server

/v1/playlist/{platform}/add.description: Adds a playlist to the user's library on the specified platform

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to add the playlist to

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

/v1/account/{userId}/{platform}/playlist.description: Returns the playlists of the user on the specified platform. This includes the playlists that are private. The response contains a field to indicate if the playlist is private and this should be respected when integrating this endpoint.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The Orchdio ID of the user

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to get the playlists from

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

/v1/account/{userId}/{platform}/albums.description: Returns the albums of the user on the specified platform

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The Orchdio ID of the user

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to get the albums from

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

get.description: Returns the albums of the user on the specified platform

/v1/account/{userId}/{platform}/artists.description: Returns the artists of the user on the specified platform

get.description: Returns the artists of the user on the specified platform

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The Orchdio ID of the user

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to get the artists from

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

/v1/account/{userId}/{platform}/history/.description: Returns the listening history of the user on the specified platform

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The Orchdio ID of the user

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform to get the albums from

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

/v1/account/.description: Returns the profile informations on all the platforms the user has authorized an app

parameters.name: x-orchdio-key
parameters.description: Your private key

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the user. This can be an email address or uuid

/v1/task/{task_id}.description: Returns the status of a task

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task

parameters.name: x-orchdio-public-key
parameters.description: The public key of the Orchdio server

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The auth token for the developer

redirect_url.description: The redirect URI of the app

webhook_url.description: The webhook URI of the app

example.name: My Awesome App
example.description: this is a very cool app

/v1/app/{app_id}.description: Returns the details of an app

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The ID of the app

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The auth token for the developer

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The ID of the app

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The auth token for the developer

requestBody.description: Fields passed during app creation. Only the fields that need to be updated need to be passed

redirect_url.description: The redirect URI of the app

webhook_url.description: The webhook URI of the app

example.name: My Awesome App
example.description: this is a very cool app

/v1/app/{app_id}/keys.description: Get the keys associated with the app

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The ID of the app

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The auth token for the developer

ConnectResponse.description: The redirect URL for the platform in order to authenticate the user on the target platform

schema.description: The redirect URL for the platform in order to authenticate the user on the target platform

oneOf.description: The converted track. This is returned if the entity is a track

entity.description: The type of entity. For a track, it would be track and playlist for a playlist

task_id.description: The ID of the playlist conversion task

message.description: A message describing the status of the request

PlatformsPayload.description: A payload containing a list of platforms

title.example: The Less I Know The Better

duration.description: The duration of the track, formatted as HH:MM:SS

title.example: The Less I Know The Better

duration.description: The duration of the track, formatted as HH:MM:SS

duration.description: The duration of the track, formatted as HH:MM:SS

duration.description: The duration of the track, formatted as HH:MM:SS

title.example: The Less I Know The Better

duration.description: The duration of the track, formatted as HH:MM:SS

length.description: Duration of the playlist, formatted as HH:MM:SS

CreateNewAppResponse.description: The response for creating a new app

description.example: The coolest app in the world.

redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

webhook_url.description: The URL to which the webhook will be sent

url.description: The URL of the entity to convert

AddPlaylistResponse.description: Add a playlist to the user's library

data.description: The link to the newly created playlist.

preview.description: The URL to the preview of the track. This may be unavailable for a track.

GetArtistsResponse.description: User's library artists for specified platform

total.description: The total number of artists the user has

GetAlbumsResponse.description: User's library albums for specified platform

total.description: The total number of albums the user has

title.example: The Dark Side of the Moon

nb_tracks.description: The platform the album is from

explicit.description: Whether the album contains explicit content

GetPlaylistsResponse.description: User's library playlists for specified platform

total.description: The total number of playlists the user has

public.description: Whether the playlist is public or not

collaborative.description: Whether the playlist is collaborative or not

nb_tracks.description: The number of tracks in the playlist

GetProfileResponse.description: The response returned when fetching a user's profile

description.example: The coolest app in the world.

redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

webhook_url.description: The URL to which the webhook will be sent

description.example: The coolest app in the world.

redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to after authentication

webhook_url.description: The URL to which the webhook will be sent

url.description: The URL of the entity to convert

AddPlaylistRequestBody.description: Add a playlist to a user's library

user.description: The user's email or their Orchdio user ID

tracks.description: An array of track IDs to add. This depends on the platform and their formats might be different. For example, a Deezer ID looks like 123456789 while a Spotify ID looks like 11dFghVXANMlKmJXsNCbNl. If all the IDs are not the same format, Orchdio will return an error.
